sources.full_text_concat:
*Īśvaravādimataparīkṣā
	    Jitāri
	  Jitāri: Kleine Texte
	    Jitāri
	    Gudrun Bühnemann
	    Arbeitskreis für tibetische und buddhisitsche Studien Universität Wien
	      Wien
	      1982
	      39-43
	  Wiener Studien zur Tibetologie und Buddhismskunde
	    8
	Kleine Texte is an edition of: Vedāprāmāṇyasiddhi, Sarvajñasiddhi, Nairātmyasiddhi, Jātinirākṛti, and *Īśvaravādimataparīkṣa. Bühneman's edition is based on the manuscript described below.

content.value: . Bühneman's edition is based on the manuscript described below.

Line breaks: In the source file, there were two types of line breaks: returns (and possible surrounding space) and hyphens+returns. These were replaced with lb-elements. The ed-attribute "gb" refers to Bühnemann's

items.text: Line breaks: In the source file, there were two types of line breaks: returns (and possible surrounding space) and hyphens+returns. These were replaced with lb-elements. The ed-attribute "gb" refers to Bühnemann's 1982 edition.

content.value: The glass plate numbers were encoded as pb-elements with the

items.text: The glass plate numbers were encoded as pb-elements with the edRef attribute with #imp-ms.

content.value: The variant readings in the footnotes were enclosed in a

items.text: The variant readings in the footnotes were enclosed in a .

content.value: References were enclosed in a ref-element.

items.text: Square brackets were encoded as surplus. This follows Bühnemann 1982 p. 48: [ ] auszulassen.
Angle brackets were encoded as supplied. This 	follows Bühnemann 1982 p. 48: < > zu ergänzen.

content.value: The footnotes were encoded as note-elements with their corresponding n-attribute. The footnote references were replaced with the corresponding note. Line breaks in the notes have been removed

children.text: , 81-85 einen Text Jitāris ediert, der im Kolophon als
idānīm ārhatamataṃ vicāryate; - ihāmī digambarāḥ dravyaparyāyarūpeṇa utpattisthitipralayātmakaṃ bhāvagrāmaṃ varṇayanti |...

Im vorliegenden Konvolut findet sich nun ein Text, der eine ganz ähnliche Struktur hat, dessen Titel uns aber nicht erhalten ist. Er umfaßt die Folios IIB|9; IIA|9; IIB|6; IIA|6; IIB|11; IIA|11; IIB|10; IIA|10; IIB|12; IIA|12; (Schluß fehlt). Entsprechend der
yaś cāsau kartā sa bhagavān Īśvara iti |
tathā hi puruṣasya vyāpāram antareṇāpy upa
pūrvakāriṇā sarvaṃ kāryaṃ pauruṣeyam iti niścīyeta |
ca pakṣīkṛtā eva | na ca pakṣīkṛte vyāpti
vyāpter grahītum aśakyatvāt kvacic ca vyāptigrāhiṇa eva pra
yathā vānyatra gṛhītavyāptikaḥ puruṣaḥ parvatādau dhūmadarśa
rtāram anumimīta iti na kiṃcid anupapannaṃ nāma |
tad asat | tathā hi puruṣavyāpāram antareṇāpi tṛṇādīn
karṇahṛdayena tṛṇādayo 'smābhiḥ sarva eva pakṣīkṛtā iti bru
vatā kiṃ nāma samādhānaṃ dattam iti na pratīmaḥ | yadi hi dhūmo
vahnim antareṇāpy upajāyamāno dṛśyeta kiṃ tasya kaścit tato
yady api tṛṇādayaḥ puruṣapūrvakā na pratīyante tathāpi na teṣām
etad apy asat | yato na tāvad iha puruṣavyāpārapūrvakatā
syād etat | yadi na buddhimatpūrvakaṃ kāryaṃ ghaṭādikam
api tathābhūtaṃ na syāt | akāraṇāt sakṛd apy anutpatteḥ |
tasmād ekam api kāryaṃ puruṣakāraṇakaṃ pratiyan viśeṣābhā
yathā mahānase vahnihetukaṃ dhūmam upalabhamānaḥ sarvam eva
eva samānaṃ pralāpaḥ | tato vyāptipratītikāle pratikṣiptam
evedṛśam | na hi vahnivyāptaṃ dhūmaṃ pratipadyamāna
nanu ghaṭādikam api kāraṇe sati bhāvāt
ucyate | tarvādikam api sati kāraṇe bhavat kāryavyavahārayogyam
iti kāryatvena vivādāspadībhūtetarayor aviśeṣād ekatra buddhi
atha manyase na kāryamātraṃ vahnimātravyāptaṃ pratipannaṃ
kiṃ tu kāryaviśeṣo dhūma iti tata eva tasyānumānaṃ na kārya
api na pratīyata ity etad evocyate | tatrāpi hi śakyam etad
dhūmo 'py agnipūrvako na syāt | akāraṇasya sakṛd apy
atha kāryāntaram agnim antareṇāpi jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam iti na
tṛṇādikam api puruṣam antareṇa jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam
upalabhyate tādṛśam eva tadvyāptam avadhāryata iti kāryamātrād
evaṃ tarhi yādṛśam eva kāryam anvayavyatirekābhyā
ruṣapūrvakam upalabhyate tādṛśam eva tadvyāptam avadhāryata
1/2 Zeile wird vom oberen Teil des nächsten Folio verdeckt.
dṛṣṭasya devakulāder iva vṛkṣāder api nāsmadādivilakṣaṇakartṛ
śācāder adṛśyasya saṃbhavāt | na ca ya eva vṛkṣādikārī puruṣo
ekakartṛkatā sidhyati | prāg eva nagaranadīparvatādīnām ekā
kāryebhyo viśeṣam anubhavantaḥ katham amī tadvilakṣaṇena kartrā
kṛtāḥ sādhyerann iti | tato yady ayam idānīm asmadādyatiśā
siddham eṣām anyādṛśatvam | siddhe cānyādṛśatve na ghaṭādīnāṃ
tāvat tat pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ tasya pramā
athāpramāṇaṃ dhūmasyāpi tena vahnivyāptir aśakyā sādhayitum
tadāpi na kāryamātrasya puruṣapūrvakatayā vyāptir upavarṇa
yituṃ yuktā | tasyaiva pratibandhasiddher asiddher ity alaṃ
